body: 所以这些老外认识中文？

for non-Chinese reader: the girl released that she was also the core curse when her friend dead. Both of them are core curse.
Her friend curse will made man crazy will bring the force to kill man, and her curse will made girl easy to love and cum with her. These two curse were also the curse of their last life.
In the end, the princess and magic girl fell in love with her, even they know she was not the "Lilian". But the first lover in Her heart was Her friend, and she was living peaceful to wait the chance to go to hell and have A reunion with Her friend.
did she just kill four dudes with the sheer force of lesbianism
I have to say the story is really crazy.
